info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 2:29PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of west central Broadwater, northwestern Madison and southern Jefferson Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 227 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm near Silver Star, or 16 miles southeast of Butte, moving northeast at 35 mph. Strong outflow winds were detected within a 20 mile radius of the storm. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boulder, Whitehall, Twin Bridges, Silver Star, Basin, Cardwell, and Waterloo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall of up to one half inch in an hour is also possible with this storm, which may lead to minor localized flooding and debris flow down steep slopes. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
